text: Kuma daga Mutãnen Littãfi akwai wanda yake idan ka bã shi amãnar kinɗãri, zai bãyar da shi gare ka, kuma daga gare su akwai wanda idan ka bã shi amãnar dĩnari, bã zai bãyar da shi gare ka ba, fãce idan kã dawwama a kansa kanã tsaye. Wannan kuwa, dõmin lalle ne sũ sun ce, "Bãbu laifi a kanmu a cikin Ummiyyai." Suna faɗar ƙarya ga Allah, alhãli kuwa suna sane
